Thanks for the upload.  I read some of the comments below with interest. Since 9-11 there has been a blossoming of conspiracy theories about anything and everything.  Regarding Waco I don't think that there is any doubt that the authorities badly mishandled the siege.  I think that this is more likely down to poor tactics than any hidden agenda.
Thunderfunk does have a point though - much of the media is in the hands of a very small group of people and they undoubtedly have the ear of the government(s) a good is example is Murdoch who owns The Times-The Sun and Sky in the UK.  Is it wise to trust established sources? In that sense, conspiracy theories are to be welomed as they keep the debate alive.
Once again - thanks for the upload.
Thanks for posting this.  ++  good stuff to get out.
